civic.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: relating to a town or city
civic.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Jackson spent the day meeting with local religious and civic leaders.
civic.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: relating to the people who live in a town or city
civic.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: It is your civic duty to vote in the local elections.
